snippet: Goals by Jamie Vardy and Riyad Mahrez propelled Leicester to a 2-1 home win over stumbling Chelsea.
abstract: Leicester beats Chelsea, 2-1; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Goals by Jamie Vardy and Riyad Mahrez propelled Leicester to a 2-1 home win over stumbling Chelsea.

headline.main: Leicester Remains in First Place in Premier League
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Tough Draw for Arsenal
